channel.title: A thought about what's next
channel.description:
Its really cool that the completion of Black Mesa is in sight. It got me thinking: If desired, what would be next for Crowbar Collective?
Wouldn't it be cool if you guys could get Valve's blessing to make Half Life 3? I couldn't think of a more appropriate group. :wink:

item.title: A thought about what's next
item.dc:creator: lambdaman
item.description:
Here’s to hoping they won’t just stop at Black Mesa. I think you guys are all pretty talented people who can do awesome things with the Source Engine.

Read full topic

item.title: A thought about what's next
item.dc:creator: Johnwalter
item.description:
Seeing how much talent the team has, i got the hype, hope and hunger to try anything from their works.

Read full topic

item.title: A thought about what's next
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
I want a new original IP made on an engine that is actually good.

Let’s see them apply their talents on something that someone else didn’t make previously.

Read full topic
